info.name: Pro/Dark Race Box
info.description:
A dark themed race text box for nitro type. Plus larger text in the race text box. And more! New Updates all the time!

DEVELOPED BY: https://www.nitrotype.com/racer/mj_keyspeed

Have a theme you want but can't find? Just contact me and I'll see what I can do!

data.title: Love how it enlarges the text so much easier too see the words and type them!
